name: ACHIEVEMENT_001
description: "Sweet! You got all the achievements! You're really somethin'. Isn't that right, Ryu?" "You have done well to reach the end of this one journey. The path to becoming a true fighter still lies ahead, but let us take time to share the joy of your accomplishment."

name: ACHIEVEMENT_002
description: Why don't you try finishing up the tutorial? You might've mastered the first step, but nailing down the fundamentals is what's important.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_003
description: Your first goal for Story Mode is just to clear it once. You can probably guess, but I cleared it with Master Zangief first!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_004
description: Whoa, I'm really mixing it with the celebrities here! C'mon, Rashid, you're the Raging Storm! Get out there and finish 5 Character Stories!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_005
description: So you wish to learn Yoga? If that is truly the case, then first you must complete the Character Story with all characters. There is great merit in walking each of their individual paths.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_006
description: If you're at a loss for what to do, why not raise a character to level 5? It should help you realize what you're missing.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_007
description: Level up 5 characters! Up to level 5 should do the trick. When it comes to food and fightin', it's quantity over quality, mate.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_008
description: Your stats are as pitiful as your strength, maggot! Come back when you've raised all characters to level 5.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_009
displayName: Slow But Steady Wins The Race
description: Your objective should be to raise a single character to level 30. There is great meaning in accomplishing what is difficult. To find your answer, you must set your sights high.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_010
description: Raise your player level to 50. Level up that much and you'll be about ready to exact you revenge.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_011
description: Your player level is a reflection of your passion! Aim for the stars, and reach level 100!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_012
description: Niiihehe! 2, 20, 200! Such a glorious sound, I could say it twice more! 200! Raise you player level to 200! I already have, niiihehe!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_013
description: Why don't you see if you can collect 10 titles? There's nothin' like a good title! Even Mel said they make me look cool!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_014
description: I am Rashid of the Turbulent Wind! You can change how you feel, just with a title! If you had 30 of them, you'd be set for the rest of your life!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_015
description: Alright, time you fought 10 network battles! The Internet is like my backyard - not a place I tend to lose! (Excludes Battle Lounge)

name: ACHIEVEMENT_016
description: Master Zangief! I fought in 50 network battles! The ring came to life with the clash of burning spirits! (Excludes Battle Lounge)

name: ACHIEVEMENT_017
description: Impossible! You fought in 300 network battles? Well then, the time for you to witness my Psycho Power draws near. Mwahaha! (Excludes Battle Lounge)

name: ACHIEVEMENT_018
description: Patience is key to any warrior's training. Fight in network battles 30 times using the standby function. The longer you wait, the greater the joy will be when you finally get picked.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_019
description: Congratulations on your first win! Keep practicing your Kung Fu in those Ranked Matches and I know you'll only get better and better!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_020
description: It seems you've won 10 Ranked Matches. Never forget how it feels to win, or your future will soon be eclipsed by defeat.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_021
description: 30 Ranked Matches already? Lemme go catch up to that! Dinner always tastes better after you've pummeled a bunch of chumps!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_022
description: Ah, your 100th Ranked Match victory. That look in your eyes tells me it was a fulfilling battle. Go forward one step at a time, and never forget this feeling.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_023
description: Winning 300 matches will put the word out for Matsuda Jiu-Jitsu! It'll be like, "the succesor or Matsuda Jiu-Jitsu, Laura Matsuda is right here!"

name: ACHIEVEMENT_024
description: Why not try fighting someone stronger than you in a Ranked Match? There's a lot you can gain from fighting stronger opponents. Beat 10 of 'em and you'll understand.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_025
description: Achieved three consecutive victories in Ranked Matches, have you? It appears you are getting a handle on your power. Maintain your modesty, and focus on your training; the path ahead is long.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_026
description: Master Zangief sent me flowers to celebrate me moving up a league for the first time! I can't read the card with all these tears!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_027
description: Did you make it to Silver League?! Horosho! You have very good muscle! You can get much stronger from now!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_028
description: Finally, Golden League! There are so many potential rivals! Now the fun really begins!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_029
description: "Finishing with an EX Special Move sure feels good, old man!" "You finally understand then, young one? How about you try doing it 300 times?" "Wha?! You know how many years that'll take?!"

name: ACHIEVEMENT_030
description: 300 Critical Art finishes... It would seem a crimson rose that blooms within an ugly heart can still be beautiful...

name: ACHIEVEMENT_031
description: When you get that feeling like "I can't let it end like this!", that's when you should use a V-Reversal. Practice it 100 times, and then you'll be able to pull it off in your sleep!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_032
description: There is a power that resides deep within you. If you wish to know what that power is, trigger a V-Skill 100 times. Do so, and that power will belong to you.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_033
description: You know, the V-Trigger is pretty handy for shifting the flow of battle. You'll know just how effective it is once you've triggered it 100 times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_034
description: You must set a character as your favorite! Can't decide who to choose? Niiihehehe! Well, you can't go wrong with Lord Bison!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_035
description: You'll never stand out without an original title. Try choosing an appropriate title for me.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_036
displayName: Failing To Prepare Is Preparing To Fail
description: Collect 30 replays, kid. Once you've done your prep and know your opponent's weaknesses, you'll be in control of the fight. Don't risk your life by rushing in blind.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_037
description: Visualization is a crucial skill, so try watching 50 replays! I watched so many, I started seeing Master Zangief in my dreams!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_038
description: When someone sets their sights on you, don't you just wanna try even harder? Add someone to your Favorites and see what happens!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_039
description: I have the direct lines for all the world's leaders recorded in my pocketbook. You should have 30 names in your Favorites at the very least.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_040
description: Go try out Training Mode for 30 minutes! "Bodybuilding never let man down." I borrowed that one from Master Zangief!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_041
description: It's about time you cleared Survival Mode on normal difficulty. You know what happens if you refuse, don't you? Let's just say the only way you live is if you keep on winning!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_042
description: A warrior's soul is ri...ripened in Survival Mode. Emerge victorious on hard difficulty and you'll be ready for me to co...consume.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_043
description: Feel like taking the plunge into Survival Mode on extreme? Come back alive, and I'll grant you an audience with none other than me, the great Lord Bison!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_044
description: You managed to get 1,000,000 FM. That's pretty good! The real value, however, is in the path you walked to earn that much.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_045
displayName: The outfit is the highlight of battle
description: The true creme de la creme know how to give spectators a good show. Now go and gain new colors for your outfit.
